name: obsidian-perma-test
description: The PERMA Profiler Obsidian plugin allows users to take the PERMA (Positive Emotion, Engagement, Relationships, Meaning, Accomplishment) Profiler test within their Obsidian vault. It automatically generates a note with results and interpretations, integrating seamlessly with the user's knowledge management workflow.

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
